statements: DELETE FROM player_statistics WHERE player_id = 100 AND RBIs > 50;
DELETE FROM player_statistics WHERE home_runs >= 20 OR batting_average < 0.250;
DELETE FROM teams WHERE state = 'California' AND city = 'Los Angeles';
DELETE FROM teams WHERE state = 'California' AND city = 'Los Angeles';
DELETE FROM players WHERE player_id = 100 AND batting_average > 0.300;
DELETE FROM player_stats WHERE player_id = 5 AND RBIs > 50;
DELETE FROM team WHERE city = 'New York' AND team_name = 'Yankees';
DELETE FROM game_stats WHERE result = 'loss' AND date < '2022-01-01' AND home_team = TRUE;
